website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty log carrier made using sturdy canvas and reinforced canvas strapping for handles.
pros: No fire retardant used, so the carrier is environmentally safe
Lifetime guarantee with full 100% money-back guarantee if unsatisfied
Dimensions are 40" x 18", and carries about 6-10 logs at a time
cons: Made from thinner material and more flimsy than expected
Short handles don't let you carry over your shoulder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality & value. This carrier works better than anticipated and after moving a cord of wood with it, it 's still in perfect condition. I was so impressed with it that I purchased a 2nd one to have as a backup. I sent a question to the seller (about availability) and received a quick, professional and courteous reply. Happy to do business with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Al A.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to bring the wood in from my garage to living room and it's perfect. It's nice and big and I can carry a good number on logs all at once so I don't have to run in and out so often. The canvas seems very strong, I believe it will last a good long time. I'm so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and extremely sturdy, and well priced for it's quality. It's easy to load too, just place it open on the ground and fill it up. I find I'm using it more than my wood cart. It's so convenient, that when I'm loading those odd pieces "that are a must to burn once the fire is started", I can place the whole carrier in my indoor wood rack. Cleaning it is a breeze too. Just brush it off outside and it's clean and ready for the next time.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Firewood carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great item at a great price. We recently moved to a new house with a fireplace and this firewood carrier is going to make life so much easier. The carrier is well constructed (made w/ canvas ) and well stitched. Love the Velcro straps that you can use to roll up the carrier so it can be easily stored. Overall, great item at a GREAT price.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: good wood carrier
customer_reviews.text: The wood carrier is exactly what I wanted. I just received it so I won't know till I put it to use how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: mwebb1234a

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, not for split logs, but to transport rolled-up quilted wall-hangings safely. It is perfect for my purpose. That said, it is substantial enough for firewood. I used something like this when I had a wood stove years ago and loved the convenience of being able to carry 2-3 armloads of wood without scattering chips all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: Connie A.

customer_reviews.title: Used daily and works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, durable, and keeps the mess of snow covered logs from getting on me. I am a big guy but lazy and don't want to make a lot of trips to the woodpile when its cold(-16 right now) so I overload it to the point of the the handles barely reaching each other. I will likely by a second to balance my load. A very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce001

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and get a thick canvas carrier. This carrier nylon material is very thin and cannot support more than 4 split logs. Probably would be fine for the occasional camping, but not for everyday use to carry logs in for the woodstove.
customer_reviews.author: Ponytammy

customer_reviews.title: Can carry more than an arm load
customer_reviews.text: With it's large size you can get a pretty good stack of wood in it. Nice sturdy handles. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars for durability, is I would of liked to have seen it made of a little heavier canvas. On the other hand the price was right .
customer_reviews.author: tbhr

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. The size is just right for him and the amount he can haul in it. Should last a Very Long Time! Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: dobiegirls

customer_reviews.title: Good buy:)
customer_reviews.text: Me gusta this thing mucho. Perfect for collecting and carrying wood while camping. It's canvas, sturdy, and the right size for a good bundle. Well made, and solid materials. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: kaseyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy. Used it a few times already. I think I like it better than my old one that had sides all around the carrying area. I can easily shake out any bark or sawdust, which can be a problem over the carpeting. The handles are comfortable, the fabric seems tough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: The handle seems comfortable for most trips to the fireplace but if you ...
customer_reviews.text: It is working well. The handle seems comfortable for most trips to the fireplace but if you are filling it to the hilt, just put on some gloves for a more comfortable grip. Brushes clean. Looking forward to a happy winter and fireside days and nights.
customer_reviews.author: Vickiannh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice; large
customer_reviews.text: Very nice; large, very sturdy, utilitarian. The only thing I didn't like are the handles. They're pretty thin; they're not going to break but I need to wear a glove if I'm carrying a lot of wood. This is more than worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats the heck out of carrying an arm full of logs...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought it... Works great, and seems very strong. I can carry in an entire nights worth of logs in 1 trip. I should have bought it last year.
customer_reviews.author: Gary DZ

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as advertised.. strong construction...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as advertised . .strong construction . .. very functional
customer_reviews.author: Safe

customer_reviews.title: Firewood carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Nice carrier, but can't figure out the Velcro straps, because there is not a receiving tab on the opposite side. I don't really need the Velcro straps; So, I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Venango

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, compared to a canvas one I had years ago. It gets the job done but its flimsy. I am wondering how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: This log toter has been wonderful! I used to carry our firewood down to ...
customer_reviews.text: This log toter has been wonderful! I used to carry our firewood down to the campfire by and and would always end up with dirt and splinters on my clothes. I can carry more wood and stay clean using this! Prompt shipping.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: It was functional. It can hold more than I ...
customer_reviews.text: It was functional. It can hold more than I can carry. I just thought it was going to be made out of heavier canvas. Hopefully it will hold up. If not, at least it didn’t cost very much.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGirl

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and far exceeds expectations considering the price. My husband was absolutely thrilled when I gave him this carrier as a gift. Will buy another soon! Service was excellent also.
customer_reviews.author: Ninezy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and well made. The material is heavy duty and I'm sure it will last a good, long while. If you put more logs in this then it was meant to hold, the handles will not come together and it will be uncomfortable to carry. This is perfect for collecting 6 to 8 logs (depending on size) to bring into the house.
customer_reviews.author: S Hawes

customer_reviews.title: My husband is the wood chopper in our family and he was very glad I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: The Northern Outback is a handy carrier and saves time and steps when toting wood indoors. The carrier rolls up neatly and can be stored away by hanging it over the firewood stand. My husband is the wood chopper in our family and he was very glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lanier

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: perfect. I beat carrying 50 pound loads and no rips
customer_reviews.author: gary d gavornik

customer_reviews.title: A Work Horse !
customer_reviews.text: Don't fall for smaller, less durable imatations ! This is large, and sturdy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: True Review

customer_reviews.title: It holds a lot of wood easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Less trips with a lot wood in to house before I could only carry 2 pieces maybe 3 but now 5 6 at a time really a load done faster Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Scott richards

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for running firewood from the outdoor location to the indoor fireplace. Velcro strap is a nice added touch. Don’t worry if you think the length of the canvas is to short, it handles longer logs just fine. Also, the straps are stitched all the way around the whole canvas; which I think is one of the better features.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight but sturdy tote. I was surprised how well it hefted a full load of wood, despite the density of the fabric but holding up very well. Only negative comment.., gotta get a better silk screen print of your logo. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dean Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My husband was super pleased with this as a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband was super pleased with this as a Christmas gift. It's durable, larger than the one he had before, and has a very comfortable handle. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good wood carrier. I've had one previously that had more of an oval/round shape so there were 'sides' on the base, so that would be nice. But this one gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I actually help with wood now!
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever carry wood without one? I don't have to get dirty when I carry wood in the house. You can carry a bundle and not worry about splinters. Total win.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not use it but it looked to be made of quality material. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping and chores!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend. I have had one for quite a while and I love it for camping. I also use it for carrying all sorts of long awkward items like lumber, pipe and branches.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Karl

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY pleased with my new Northern Outback SUPERSIZED Log carrier
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased with my new Northern Outback SUPERSIZED Log carrier. It is just the right weight to carry my firewood and the price was certainly right. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Carroll Stanzak

customer_reviews.title: I am better off keeping them another year than to replace them ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this log carrier could be guaranteed for life. It is very thin and weak material. I have two log carriers now that I was going to replace with this one. I am better off keeping them another year than to replace them with this one. I am sure that after one or two years all that would be left of this one would be the straps. I had great hopes for this one and expected a heavy duty product and got a light weight worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 3 years ago. Still going strong. Use the hell out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A. Ianniello

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty item! The first thought that strikes you when it arrives is that it doesn't look as durable as L.L. Bean's but that is definitely not the case. I use it 5 days a week every week to haul broken pallet wood with nails and I have yet to put a hole in it. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H. Dubuc

customer_reviews.title: Holds Many Logs
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and has saved my back a couple times already
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: does a great job. good sturdy material. probably my fault thinking it would hold more wood.
customer_reviews.author: Martens Family

customer_reviews.title: it does a great job. Don't have to make as many trips ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it yesterday when it was very cold outside, it does a great job. Don't have to make as many trips to the wood pile.
customer_reviews.author: Ruger

customer_reviews.title: but now he love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dad was skeptical when I first gave this to him as a gift, but now he love it!! It makes carrying wood from the back yard to the house so much easier and much more effective!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Northern Outback Supersized  Firewood Log Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good size for carrying wood. Others I looked at seemed to hold one or two pieces. This one will hold more than I can carry. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: B.  Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Great Way To Carry Wood!
customer_reviews.text: A great way to carry wood and your arms won't get bark and dust all over them! My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Firewood carrier seems to be well constructed. Have used it for several weeks now with no issues. I was tired of making a mess carrying wood inside and this makes it much easier to grab more wood with less mess. Carries a good bit of wood with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: stong material
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough material and rolls up easily for easy storage. It seams like a good deal for the money. I am pleased with this purchace. Considering pruchacising another so I can haul double the amount of wood in.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Jette

customer_reviews.title: Worked beautifully! I was able to carry about 6 logs ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully! I was able to carry about 6 logs and kindling comfortably to their destination. The carrier is very stable with no tipping or spilling of any wood. I am very happy that I purchased this item. The comfortable lugging helped us enjoy our cozy fire.
customer_reviews.author: Esther H. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: Had to move a full cord. Carrier is very strong and got the job done. You can get about six decent sized logs per load.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: Hello kieth, i,m pleased to know that there are still a few good out-fits around manufacturing in the USA. I have been using your 'carerier' for a couple of days and I love it! I burn 3 to 4 cord a-year, so i tote alot of wood. Larger size = less trips. Thanks randy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The supersize is great with one exception
customer_reviews.text: The supersize is great with one exception...I tend to overload it. No more messy floors! the construction is excellent. I feel it will last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My father had been looking for one so I ordered this one and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for. Holds 6-8 logs meaning I can get my evenings wood in just a one load. Much easier than what I used to do, cradle it in my arm. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built, used it to carry oak with it at full capacity for about a week now. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rogan

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Way to Schlepp Firewood!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 69 years old. I purchased two of the supersized totes. One for each hand. They make light of carrying firewood from pile to hearth. Should have done this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price, fast service, and the carrier works as expected. Just right!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: Great product...great company!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and the company has been really nice. Sent me emails thanking me and giving me care tips. As well as leaving numbers and email in case I wasn't pleased. Glad I ordered the supersized carrier. we use bigger logs in our fireplace and it's perfect for carrying them inside! Would definitely suggest buying one if you carry wood!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it held up great. I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Strong and well-made. I used it to move half a cord of firewood around to the back of my house, with two people carrying it and loading it as much as possible each trip. We were almost abusing it, but it held up great. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chouinard

customer_reviews.title: Taller strap handles would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The material is thinner than I expected but it's held up reasonably well. Taller strap handles would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shantzonpoint

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is great product! Well made and fairly priced. I'm also impressed with the level of customer service from the company--personal emails making sure that I received it and it's what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: A very useful tool made of good quality
customer_reviews.text: A very useful tool made of good quality. Should help a lot when carrying wood from outside to the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Half Pint

customer_reviews.title: Seems good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice carrier, good size, robust and easy to use. Only just got it, so time will tell how well it wears.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product even when not used as intended
customer_reviews.text: We actually are not using this to carry firewood but to carry a guitar pedal board for my husband's band. It is perfect! The quality is what I would expect for the price and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: nonfictionqueen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's basic and simple... Does the job it says it will do. What more could you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my Nephew and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KMTL

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large wood carrier
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and large enough for a good load. Good product. Just arrived. Will test it when the weather gets cold enough for a fire. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: quality was not all that great but I did receive it quickly
customer_reviews.author: Rockyluvsadeal

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Log Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Terrific carrier. Exactly what I was looking for and exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tiber Reader

customer_reviews.title: so it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Leather it's not In fact, a thin canvas material. But it holds a load of wood, so it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Frank X. Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Seems very durable and handy. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase another product from them.
customer_reviews.author: M2Woodcrafts

customer_reviews.title: Your firewood log carrier is exactly what I envisioned. ...
customer_reviews.text: Your firewood log carrier is exactly what I envisioned. However I am not sure what the Velcro tabs are for.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Laney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived right on time - - quite sturdy and very sizable without a doubt
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time - - quite sturdy and very sizable without a doubt. Carries a huge "armload" of wood with ease - - at least for me. Most satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: This carrying bag is built very good. Thick material and strong stitching
customer_reviews.text: This carrying bag is built very good. Thick material and strong stitching. Able to carry plenty of logs at one time.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Exactly what I needed to haul bundles of firewood upstairs to my apartment. Makes the chore lighter & less cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: plink

customer_reviews.title: Soft Log Carrier
customer_reviews.text: A little softer than I would have liked but sized right
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money To Save On Effort
customer_reviews.text: Makes it so much easier to carry in wood. I can carry twice as much in one arm as I could with two. Just wish it came in a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin G

customer_reviews.title: great carrier for the price
customer_reviews.text: This log holder is light in weight but strong. Open sides allow for long logs and the strap/handle takes the weight.
customer_reviews.author: SamB

customer_reviews.title: Not a great value
customer_reviews.text: What looks like a thick, heavy duty carrier in reality is a very thin and lightweight product.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my husband for Christmas -- he loves it. Not only can he put a good load of wood on it, he says he likes it because he can fold the bark and little pieces that fall off the wood into it and carry it outside to be shaken off.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hook

customer_reviews.title: I received the log carrier today it looks like a sturdy carrier and the roll-up Velcro straps are ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the log carrier today it looks like a sturdy carrier and the roll-up Velcro straps are very handy. After I've had a chance to use it a while, I might give it the fifth star.
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: This wood tote is great, however I wish the handles were longer
customer_reviews.text: This wood tote is great, however I wish the handles were longer. If you put lots of wood in it, they don't reach each other.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Large sturdy log carrier
customer_reviews.text: Nice large sturdy fabric log carrier that is made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for carring firewood
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this is the best thing ever!! He loves the ease of carrying a substantial bundle of fire wood . We highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JANE H KING

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Great carry bag, very good quality and bonus is carry handles envelope the whole bag underneath making it more secure. Would definitely order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Item is attractive, functional, sturdy and well-designed. The manufacturer is a small business that cares about the quality of their product and customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Z.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight but seems strong and well made. Cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. It's much easier to carry an armful of logs into the house with this. I don't end up wearing sawdust, leaves, twigs etc on my shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent strong and holds a of wood, very happy with carrier
customer_reviews.author: Peter T King

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - and I push it to the limits with large loads! We had a smaller nylon bag before but this is so much sturdier and solid. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Henkel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to bring in wood from the garage
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great job accurate order. Very quick shipping. Very good product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Must higher quality than most on the market. Hubby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Extra set of hands
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need; no more walking to wood pile and putting in my arms. Now can open door tote in, and don't need to yell for help!!
customer_reviews.author: Madd Dad

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Just received our new carried today, and put it right to work. Normally I would carry loads down the stairs in armfuls, this new carrier not only made my life easier but I got the wood loaded in half the time. I would highly recommend this useful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to move enough wood indoors from the wood pile.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt in Montana

customer_reviews.title: A Little Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Size is good but fabric too thin and not stiff enough. It will do the job but I guess you get what you pay for. I have an LL Bean carrier that I love, but probably 2X the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Deets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was just what I needed and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K. Cashdollar

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and an excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do not use it for firewood, I use it to carry hay. Very well built and an excellent value for the price. Shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Log carrier arrived and is of very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Log carrier arrived on time, and appears to be of very good quality. Look forward to using carrier as the winter progresses
customer_reviews.author: Gary Y

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at how thin the material is ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how thin the material is. Most log carriers are made of way thicker canvas. Will be surprised if it makes it through very many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: GrassHopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. This firewood carrier was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband to make carrying wood ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to make carrying wood into tha basement easier and he really likes it. He can bring in more wood in less trips too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Browe

product_meta.title: Alfaw Personal Space Heater, Electric Portable Ceramic Mini
product_meta.description:
Handheld Dog Repellent, Ultrasonic Infrared Dog Deterrent, Bark Stopper + Good Behavior Dog Training

Note: Proffessional trainer emits a high frequency sound that commands your pet's attention, so he obeys your commands. The sound is silient to people, but clearly audible to dogs and cats

Use pet trainer to: 

▲Eliminate excessive barking 
▲Eliminate jumping on people 
▲Stay off the furniture 
▲Stop clawing, scratching and biting 
▲Excellent aid to discourage stray or unleashed dogs from approaching you or your pet It can be used a torch

How To Use Pet Trainer: 

▲1. Point your pet trainer directly at the dog or cat always using an outstretched arm from a distance of approximately 6 feet away(effective up to approx. 20 feet) 
▲2. Give the verbal command, then immediately press the button for one or two seconds 
▲3. Repeat steps one and two until your pet responds to your commands

Specifications: 

▲Material: ABS 
▲Color: Black 
▲Frequency:35-45HKZ 
▲Size: 4.3x1.5x0.8in 
▲Power: Uses one 9V Alkaline battery

Box Contains: 

▲1 x Repeller 
▲1 x Instructions
feature_bullets: ◆Effective: Intense ultrasonic signal to scare the Dogs, Cats, Wild Boars, Mouse, Birds and more other animals away from your zone, house, garden, or yard more.

◆Safe & ECO-Friendly: No chemical components threatens human's health, the Passive Infrared sensor (PIR) detects motion and triggers and then the ultrasonic speaker emitting a tone that people cannot hear but chases away common outdoor pests.
◆Energy-Saving: Powered by solar energy, cordless and rechargeable, high efficiency and low power consumption.
◆Weatherproof: All year-round and virtually all weather conditions still 100% working.
◆Easy installation: It can be mounted in ground with the provided spike, or hang on wall through the back slot (With direct sunshine recommended)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
